title: JeetWin Website Redesign with Attractive Theme and Hero Banners

requirements.text: Create a full-page layout that mirrors the structure of https://jeet-win.live/, including: top navigation bar with logo and login/register buttons, hero section, games/sports categories section, promotional banners section, featured games grid, footer with links and legal info.

quotes: Copy the contents of the website

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation bar is present with logo, login and register CTAs
Page sections match the general layout of jeet-win.live
Footer includes relevant links and legal disclaimer text

requirements.text: Apply an attractive redesigned visual theme using a rich gold, deep black, and crimson red color palette with bold typography, glowing accents, and premium casino-style aesthetics. Enforce this theme consistently across all sections.

quotes: some more attractive design changes and color theme

acceptanceCriteria: Primary colors are gold (#FFD700), deep black (#0A0A0A), and crimson red (#C0132F)
Typography is bold and high-contrast throughout
Glowing neon-style accents are applied to buttons, cards, and section headings
Theme is consistent across navigation, hero, cards, and footer

requirements.text: Build a full-width hero section at the top of the page featuring an auto-playing image carousel/slider with at least 5 banner slides. Each slide should display a promotional banner image, a headline, a subheadline, and a CTA button. Include previous/next navigation arrows and dot indicators.

quotes: add hero section multiple images banner

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section spans full viewport width
Auto-plays through at least 5 banner images
Each slide has headline, subheadline, and CTA button
Navigation arrows and dot indicators are visible and functional
Transitions are smooth (fade or slide animation)

requirements.text: Display a horizontal scrollable sports and games category tab bar below the hero section with icons and labels for categories such as: Cricket, Football, Casino, Slots, Live Casino, Card Games, Lottery. Clicking a tab filters the visible game/sport cards below.

quotes: Copy the contents of the website

acceptanceCriteria: Category tabs are horizontally scrollable on smaller screens
Each tab has an icon and label
Active tab is visually highlighted in gold
Selecting a tab filters the game grid accordingly

requirements.text: Create a featured games/sports grid section displaying game cards. Each card should show a game banner image, game title, and a 'Play Now' button. Use the AI-generated images as card thumbnails.

quotes: Copy the contents of the website
generate images and use in the website

acceptanceCriteria: Game cards are displayed in a responsive grid (2 cols mobile, 4 cols desktop)
Each card has a banner image, title, and 'Play Now' CTA
Cards have hover effects (scale + glow)
AI-generated images are used as card thumbnails

requirements.text: Add a promotional offers/bonuses section with at least 3 offer cards. Each card should show a banner image, offer title (e.g., 'Welcome Bonus 200%', 'Refer a Friend', 'Daily Cashback'), a short description, and a 'Claim Now' button.

quotes: Copy the contents of the website

acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 promotional offer cards are displayed
Each card has an image, title, description, and CTA button
Cards use the gold/red/black theme with glowing borders

requirements.text: Render all AI-generated images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them in the hero slider, game cards, and promotional banners.

quotes: generate images and use in the website

acceptanceCriteria: All image tags reference paths under /assets/generated/
Images load correctly in all sections
No broken image links

requirements.text: Implement a sticky top navigation bar with the JeetWin Pro logo on the left, navigation links (Home, Sports, Casino, Promotions, About) in the center, and Login / Register buttons on the right. On mobile, collapse nav links into a hamburger menu.

quotes: Copy the contents of the website

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation is sticky and visible on scroll
Logo is on the left
Login and Register buttons are on the right with distinct styling
Mobile hamburger menu toggles the nav links

requirements.text: Create a footer section with columns for: Quick Links, Games, Support (Contact Us, FAQ, Responsible Gaming), social media icons, and a legal disclaimer text. Use dark background with gold accent text.

quotes: Copy the contents of the website

acceptanceCriteria: Footer has at least 3 link columns
Social media icons are displayed
Legal disclaimer text is present
Footer uses the dark/gold theme

constraints: All images must be served as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated — do not route images through the backend
Do not integrate any real payment, login, or gambling backend functionality
Do not use blue or purple as primary colors — use gold, black, and crimson red
nonGoals: Real user authentication or Internet Identity login
Actual payment processing or wallet integration
Live sports data or real-time odds feeds
Backend game logic or betting engine
Any third-party API integrations (payment gateways, sports data APIs)
